website_summaries.verdict: A simple folding table for up to four kids. Very affordable and storable.
pros: Folds completely flat for easy storage
Hinges are durable and secure for extra protection

customer_reviews.title: Whimsical party theme 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: The tables were great. Got them fast. 1 of 2 had a small dent but was not really a big deal to me I think it’s great for small kids 3-6 maybe. My nine-year-old was too tall lol. Purchased with the chivari chairs, also from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lakeita Rudder

customer_reviews.title: No regrets.
customer_reviews.text: This table is amazing. Almost didn't buy it because of the one review, which was a negative review, but I am so very glad that I did. It is very durable and doesn't seem like it will be easily dented from every day use. I think the other reviews shipping was at fault and not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kriss

customer_reviews.title: Great size for ages 2yrs to 6yrs old!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size table. I was worried the height was going to be a bit short as compared to the kids card table I am replacing with this. Although about a 3/4" shorter in height it works great! Four kids can sit at this table and color and or play and lean on it and it holds up wonderfully. I use this is in my daycare and yes, I would recommend this table.
customer_reviews.author: DCSI

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size table for small children.
customer_reviews.text: These tables were perfect for children’s seating at my events. I sat 4 children to a table but I see that I can easily sit 6 if I need to. They’re sturdy and of great quality. They’re light and easy to transport. When my budget allows I will certainly be ordering at least 4 more of these. They’re really short so they’re great for children 1-6/7 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Essence Creations and Event Decor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this table!!
customer_reviews.text: This table was the best investment for my grandkids. It is the perfect size and a mini version of our adult table. We set it up the minute the kids arrive and take it down right after they leave. They eat,color, play with their toys and about everything they do involves this table. I got stackable chairs so we can use one or six at the table. Even decorated it for the kids for Christmas and Birthday party.
customer_reviews.author: Drs

customer_reviews.title: Nice and worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cute table. Came in kind of beat up and didnt have any available to return. Although it's not as nice looking with bent up corners. I kept it since it's just being used for a kids class. Perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Riena Willie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy table and easy to clean. It seats 4 children comfortably. The only disadvantage to this purchase is that this table is NOT adjustable to height. I have 3 year old twins and they are tough critics- but they love it! We use it for crafts, homework, snack time as well as dinner. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! All 3 kids ages 2-6 have plenty of elbow space for arts and crafts. Portable, I store it under the couch when they are done. Easy to clean. It was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Great play space
customer_reviews.text: This table really fits the bill! It is lightweight, and sturdy. It folds up easily to a flat 48" x about 4" and stores behind the closet door. It offers a large, durable space for my young grandchildren to play. It is also much more comfortable for me to play with the kids on this table than on the floor. Perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Mary E

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The legs on one side would not lock properly so every time you moved or put pressure on it the table would fall. We needed it for my grandsons birthday so we used electrical tape to keep the legs from folding. Not expecting this to happen the box is gone and we are out of luck to return it. If you get this product test it out days before you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but Hard To Clean Completely
customer_reviews.text: Because this is a kid-sized table, kids use it. And kids tend to get things dirty. I'm having a hard time getting off marker stains, ketchup, clay residue etc. even with cleaning agents.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose but is very hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a good value. Although it serves the purpose, this table is impossible to keep clean. I have used bleach, Awesome, and Magic Eraser. Nothing will completely remove all the crayon markings and other marks that come with daily use by children. It is lightweight which is nice but it is also very easy for children to move around so it is constantly being scooted. I chose it because it was a lower price than some other tables.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and perfect height for the little people. We used it for my son's 5th bday party.
customer_reviews.author: Tumelo Nteso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a playroom!
customer_reviews.text: Brought this from Santa at Christmas for our playroom! Perfect for multiple uses! ( my mom used it for her grandchildren at Christmas dinner) First one I ordered arrived with the corner busted, I requested a replacement and everything went smoothly! From return to getting the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Lmmt

customer_reviews.title: arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived damaged, so I don't consider it that sturdy. Not returning it because I don't want to bother to tote it off to a UPS store, and it is a table for the cat food anyway. So, I feel like I spent too much $ for a damaged cat food table.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Ravenwood

customer_reviews.title: Good table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. I have it under a window and sit with on a pillow to do my make up and moisturize. I love how easy it is to store under the bed and fold up. I also want to use it as a coffee table on a porch some day!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Graham

customer_reviews.title: I must write a review about it because it is really good in quality and I think I am lucky to ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write a review, but with this table, I must write a review about it because it is really good in quality and I think I am lucky to have it.
customer_reviews.author: thien an

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a table for outdoor and indoor activities with my kids. They love it, it’s then perfect size to eat, play, do anything. My kids are ages 6, 4, & 2. It’s great too when other kids come over and it’s easy to store. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Giselle Kabbany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Love the table. It's perfect for the kids to use for school. I use it when doing my diamond paintings and puzzles.
customer_reviews.author: Kenya Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Great height for cat litter box for elderly.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 86 y/o mom! Very worried about her cleaning out the cat litter, which was on the floor. Now it is up on this table and she doesn’t have to bend. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Janet W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but difficult to clean due to textured surface
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table for children to do art projects and messy activities such as play-doh. This table has a texture on the surface that makes it very hard to clean. I personally would not re purchase this because I was specifically looking for something that I could wipe down easily. The table is sturdy and just a smaller version of the larger folding tables that you see at yard sales or outdoor functions. I can fit 2 plastic children’s Ikea chairs per side.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Check the table before you throw out the box
customer_reviews.text: Product came with a dent in it. We already threw out the box so it would’ve been too much trouble to try and exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Used for the kids
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to have so my daughter can have her little friends over for tea parties. It was perfect for children under 9.
customer_reviews.author: Gillian Swaby

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy made good and perfect size for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: The tables worked great to the little ones at the party. They are the perfect size for toddlers. We use them for rentals
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great table for preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: Great table that seats up to 6 preschoolers. Sets up and takes down very easily. The top stains a bit from almost anything with color, but it’s still relatively easy to wipe down so long as you don’t mind minor stains. I expect to get a ton of use out of this table.
customer_reviews.author: NHL

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but...
customer_reviews.text: This will suit its purpose for a child's table, too bad it came with a damaged corner and a box that smelled a bit like cigarette smoke.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids like to do lots of activities and eat at this table.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: The tables are sturdy and easy to clean. They are perfect for our preschool class in our daycare center. The tables are sturdy and easy to clean. They are perfect for the preschool class in our daycare center. The tables are perfect for the preschool class in our daycare center.They are sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can seat 6 kids.
customer_reviews.text: Brought for kids and use it for multi activities. Surface easy to clean most art supplies come out.
customer_reviews.author: caraea

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. The legs won't lock. The kids were eating and half the table dropped. Its the worst when you buy something for your kids and its a bomb.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this table so much! We use it for dinner in front of the tv occasionally. It is easy to set up and take down, small enough to store behind a bookshelf really easily. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: rB

customer_reviews.title: Wrong table
customer_reviews.text: This table was not the size I expected. This is a daycare sized toddler table. The description of the table is completely off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our children's table!
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for some new children's tables for our church. This is perfect for our young friends to have a place to sit to eat or work on crafts! Excellent quality and they are thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy ever!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter eats her snacks at the table, colors with me, sets doll house on it, the perfect height for playing. One of the Best Buy’s I have made.
customer_reviews.author: marcy

customer_reviews.title: Item itself is great
customer_reviews.text: The item itself is great but had problems getting it shipped from Amazon warehouse and once it finally arrived the table had damage from being pinched in transportation. I kept it with the cosmetic defect as I needed it for schooling at home with my child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Used at my 2 year granddaughters birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Used at my 2 year granddaughters birthday party and the kids enjoyed this table very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be little overpriced but I specifically needed these ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be little overpriced but I specifically needed these dimensions for a table and it serverd the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Bent Corners
customer_reviews.text: It is okay for the price but the tables do arrive with bent corners. I ordered two at different times for my little art students and both arrived in the same condition. Luckily I only needed the tables for function.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Feels like sand paper to clean. Original table came damaged on corners. Had replaced and the next one came damaged as well but not as bad.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: First one arrived damaged, but no problem getting second replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: arrived dented
customer_reviews.text: I like the table, seems nice and sturdy. But it did arrive damaged!
customer_reviews.author: dia m.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this table for Easter dinner For the kids to eat at. It’s the perfect height, but arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Ferree

customer_reviews.title: unstable legs
customer_reviews.text: the legs do not stay open and my kids constantly fall due to its faulty stability. theyve officially been using the table as a slide. i wish i had opened it sooner i purchased for my sons party and by then it was to late to return, so it was a party slide.
customer_reviews.author: Sherin Ziadeh

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This table is what I was looking for but it came bent and smashed on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Issue that couldn't get resolved on time!
customer_reviews.text: Product came with the corners bend and broken! I order two of then. I had to buy expensive ones to get it on time for my 1st boy birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture 3.97-Foot Kid's Granite White Plastic Folding Table
product_meta.description: You no longer need to worry about kids coloring and playing at your dining room or kitchen table with this child sized plastic folding table. The rectangular kids folding table is great even if you have only one or two small children in the home to accommodate cousins and play dates. This toddler sized table is perfectly sized for kiddos to enjoy meals, reading, craft projects and play time. Add this table to your home daycare or classroom as children learn their lessons and enjoy an afternoon of coloring. The low maintenance granite white top is easy to clean when spills occur. If you're hosting an off-site event bring this portable play table with you for a designated location for kids to gather. After use the legs lock into place underneath the tabletop to be transported or stored away until next time.
feature_bullets: Have place for toddlers to gather around when relatives and classmates come over for a visit. This 24x48 kids folding table can seat up to 4 kids with enough space for them to doodle.
Multipurpose kids folding table with leg locking mechanism
1.5" thick plastic top is waterproof and stain resistant
Ideal uses: crafts, coloring, parties, reading, snacks, lunch and dinner
PRODUCT MEASUREMENTS >>> Overall Size: 23.875"W x 47.75"D x 19"H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
